item.title: LAL-720W-50ah
item.dc:creator: rebaonefaithmatlaba@gmail.com
item.description:
ESTIMATED RECHARGES (SINGLE DEVICE CONNECTED):

  • Smart Phone (3500mAh): 40
  • Tablet (7000mAh): 20
  • Portable Speaker (7500mAh): 18
  • Action Camera (1250mAh): 112
  • Head Lamp (2200mAh): 63

ESTIMATED RUN TIME (SINGLE DEVICE CONNECTED):

  • Laptop (50W): 10 hrs
  • Lightbulb (11W): 46 hrs
  • Internet Router (12W): 43 hrs
  • 42″ LED TV (100W): 5 hrs
item.content:encoded:
LAL-720W-50ah

  • Battery Lithium – LiFePO4
  • 2000 Cycle Life
  • 50ah Battery
  • 720W Inverter
  • Modified Sinewave
  • Plug and Play
  • Laptop 16 Hour Run Time
  • Desktop + Monitor 3.5 Hours Run Time
  • TV + DSTV Decoder 3.5 Hours Run Time

item.title: GIZZU 518Wh Portable Power Station
item.dc:creator: rebaonefaithmatlaba@gmail.com
item.description:
ESTIMATED RECHARGES (SINGLE DEVICE CONNECTED):

  • Smart Phone (3500mAh): 40
  • Tablet (7000mAh): 20
  • Portable Speaker (7500mAh): 18
  • Action Camera (1250mAh): 112
  • Head Lamp (2200mAh): 63

ESTIMATED RUN TIME (SINGLE DEVICE CONNECTED):

  • Laptop (50W): 10 hrs
  • Lightbulb (11W): 46 hrs
  • Internet Router (12W): 43 hrs
  • 42″ LED TV (100W): 5 hrs
item.content:encoded:
FEATURES:

  • 518Wh
  • 500W Power Output
  • Lithium-Ion Battery Technology
  • LED Flashlight
  • Powers Various Small Appliances and Devices
  • Portable Wherever and Whenever You Need It
  • Ideal Power Solution for Power Outages
  • Supports Solar Charging (Solar Panels sold separately)
  • Rugged Design

SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Battery Capacity: 140000mAh / 518Wh Lithium-Ion
  • Inverter: Pure Sine Wave
  • PD Input/Output: 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/2.25A
  • USB QC 3.0 Output: 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A
  • USB Output 2/3: 5V/3.1A (Single Port 2.4A Max)
  • DC Output: 12V/12A (Single Port 10A Max)
  • AC Output: 230V/50Hz/500W (Single Port)
  • Lifespan: 1000 Charging Cycles
  • Portable Fridge (100W): 5 hrs
  • Dimensions: 26.4 x 23.4 x 16.3 cm
  • Weight: 5140g

CHARGING TIMES:

  • AC Adapter: 24V/3A (9.5hrs)
  • DC Car Charger: 12V (16hrs)
  • DC Solar Panel: 60W (9.5hrs)
  • PD Port: 45W (12.5hrs)
  • AC Adapter + PD Port: 24V/2.5A + 45W (5.5hrs)

ESTIMATED RECHARGES (SINGLE DEVICE CONNECTED):

  • Smart Phone (3500mAh): 40
  • Tablet (7000mAh): 20
  • Portable Speaker (7500mAh): 18
  • Action Camera (1250mAh): 112
  • Head Lamp (2200mAh): 63

ESTIMATED RUN TIME (SINGLE DEVICE CONNECTED):

  • Laptop (50W): 10 hrs
  • Lightbulb (11W): 46 hrs
  • Internet Router (12W): 43 hrs
  • 42″ LED TV (100W): 5 hrs

PROTECTION FEATURES:

  • Short-Circuit Protection
  • Over-Current Protection
  • Over-Voltage Protection
  • Under-Voltage Protection
  • Over-Load Protection
  • Temperature Protection

WHAT’S IN THE BOX:

  • Gizzu 518Wh Portable Power Station x1
  • AC Adapter x1
  • 12V Car Charger Cable x1
  • 2-in-1USB Charging Cable x1
  • Accessory Storage Pouch x1
  • User Manual x1

item.title: GIZZU 242Wh Power Station
item.dc:creator: rebaonefaithmatlaba@gmail.com
item.description:
ESTIMATED RECHARGES:

  • Smart Phone (3500mAh): 18.5
  • Tablet (7000mAh): 9
  • Portable Speaker (750mAh): 85

ESTIMATED RUN TIME:

  • Laptop (50W): 3.9 hours
  • Lightbulb (11W): 17.5 hours
  • Internet Router (10W): 19.5 hours
item.content:encoded:
FEATURES:

  • 150W Power Output
  • 242Wh
  • LED Flashlight
  • Rugged Design
  • Lightweight and Portable

SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Battery Capacity: 242Wh/67200mAh, 3.6V Lithium-Ion
  • Inverter: Modified Sine Wave
  • Ac Input: DC15V/3A
  • Solar Panel Input: MPPT, 14V-22V/3A (Max)
  • USB QC 3.0 Output: 5-12V/18W
  • USB Output: 5V/2.4A
  • Type-C PD Output: 5-12V/18W
  • DC Output: 9-12.6V/10A (14.5A Max)
  • AC Output: 220V/50Hz, Rated Power: 150W, Max Power: 200W, Peak Power: 300W
  • Lifespan: >500 Charging Cycles
  • Product Dimensions: 20.4 x 9.1 x 18.7 cm
  • Product Weight: 1890g

PROTECTION FEATURES:

  •  Short-Circuit Protection
  • Over-Current Protection
  • Over-Voltage Protection
  • Under-Voltage Protection
  • Over-Load Protection
  • Temperature Protection

CHARGING:

  • AC Adapter: 15V/3A (8hrs)
  • DC Car Charger: 13.5V/2A (12hrs)
  • DC Solar Panel: 18V/50W (8hrs)

ESTIMATED RECHARGES:

  • Smart Phone (3500mAh): 18.5
  • Tablet (7000mAh): 9
  • Portable Speaker (750mAh): 85

ESTIMATED RUN TIME:

  • Laptop (50W): 3.9 hours
  • Lightbulb (11W): 17.5 hours
  • Internet Router (10W): 19.5 hours

WHAT’S IN THE BOX:

  • Gizzu 242Wh Portable Power Station – Black x1
  • AC Adapter x1
  • Car Adapter x1
  • 12V Car Charger Adapter x1
  • User Manual x1
